medium: Collage with gouache, china marker, watercolor, color pencil and varnish on Japanese paper
title: Eclipse
marks: Signature, Title and Date at center bottom, in pencil: [on 2 26 \'79 / Eclips
description: large orange field at bottom; green and red rectangles in URC; blue rectangles at center; tan triangle in ULQ
creditline: Given in memory of Robert and Martha Tickle
